Name: Tactical Recon
About the game: Looking for an epic game with tens of thousands of hours with gameplay... look further! But if you rather play a fun game, short levels with good variation and some bloody violence, this one might be it! Made by a gamer dude that is far over thirty, who wished he made this one for the Amiga 500 back in 1987 when he was five, the results shows retro style with many suits, weapons and bombs! * 2D Retro platform shooter. * Story with voice acting. * Made with smaller levels, easy to pick up.
